org.geppetto.simulation.manager

Class ExperimentRunThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.geppetto.simulation.manager.ExperimentRunThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, ISimulatorCallbackListener

    public class ExperimentRunThread
extends java.lang.Thread
implements ISimulatorCallbackListener
    The ExperimentRun is created when an experiment can be executed, during the init phase all the needed services are created.
    Author:
    dandromereschi, matteocantarelli
